details.title: Special offer just for you!
details.text:
You get 25GB Dropbox space included in your Vodafone plan free for 3 months:

  • Then pay €1.99 per month
  • Cancel any time!
  • Complete Dropbox Get Started guide to activate

checkbox.label: I accept terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: Please accept the terms and conditions
checkbox.confirmationMessage: By selecting to subscribe now you will activate the free Dropbox offer for 3 months. At the end of the free period, you will be moved to a paid subscription at €1.99 per month. Simply cancel anytime during your free offer and you will not be charged.

accordion.label: Offer details
accordion.text:
Get Started

When you accept your offer you will receive 3GB of bonus Dropbox space. In order to get your full 25GB you need to complete 5 steps in the Dropbox Get Started guide at www.dropbox.com/gs

Additional space

The space given is on top of any current Dropbox space you may already have.

Internet charges

You'll pay our standard data charges to use this service when you're roaming or when you've exceeded your data allowance.

Stopping the offer

This offer lasts for 3 months. At the end of the 3 months we will inform you that your offer will roll over into a paid subscription. You can unsubscribe from the offer any time via the My Offer page in your Backup+ app.

success.title: Congratulations!
success.text:
We have started you off with 3GB of additional space in your Dropbox account!

Don’t forget, you need to complete the Dropbox Get Started guide to unlock your full 25GB offer.

Already completed the Dropbox Get Started guide?

You now have 25GB additional Dropbox space.

You’ll still will be able to use Backup+ for syncing your contacts and backing up to Dropobx as long as you have enough Dropbox space.
